nodes.text: Onar Koma was a scarred Ualaq Aqualish bodyguard that allied himself with the Alliance to Restore the Republic against the Galactic Empire. He was a large and extremely strong warrior, and a formidable foe in battle. During the Galactic Civil War he was joined on a mission to Tatooine by the Mandalorian Shyla Varad and Rodian gunslinger, Vinto Hreeda.
